text: yang phraxngkh theanan khux thang klab khxng phwk than thanghlay sayya khx ngxallxh nan pen cring semx thæcring phraxngkh nan thrng reim kar srang læw phraxngkh k thrng hı man bangkeid khun xik khrang hnung pheux thrng txbthæn brrda phu sraththa læa phu prakxb khwam di doy theiyngthrrm swn brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nan phwk khea ca di rab kheruxng dum thi rxn cad læa kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb pheraa phwk khea ptiseth mi yxm sraththa
